publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2805 Mr Brian Monteith: Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam-That the Parliament notes the publication of the annual newsletter of the Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam and congratulates it on the accomplishment of 250 years of teaching Arabic and Islamic Studies in Scotland; believes that it is a tribute to the University of Edinburgh that the department has been awarded a five star rating in the recent Research Assessment Exercise, and wishes it every success in attracting more students to these studies.
S1M-2805 Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam (lodged on 27 February 2002) Mr David Davidson*, Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-2805 Mr Brian Monteith: Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam-That the Parliament notes the publication of the annual newsletter of the Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam and congratulates it on the accomplishment of 250 years of teaching Arabic and Islamic Studies in Scotland; believes that it is a tribute to the University of Edinburgh that the department has been awarded a five star rating in the recent Research Assessment Exercise, and wishes it every success in attracting more students to these studies. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Mr Keith Harding, Tommy Sheridan*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2805 Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam (lodged on 27 February 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2805 Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam (lodged on 27 February 2002) Murdo Fraser*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2805 Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam (lodged on 27 February 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2805 Edinburgh Institute for the Study of the Arab World and Islam (lodged on 27 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
